title: An Assembly Such as This
description:
Set vividly against the colourful historical and political background ofthe Regency, Pamela Aidan writes in a style comfortably at home with JaneAusten but with a wit and humour very much her own. While remainingfaithful to the characters and events in Austen's original, Aidan adds herown cast of fascinating characters, weaving for the reader a richlysatisfying tapestry of Darcy's past and present.
About the Author


Pamela Aidan, librarian, teacher, and storyteller claims a life-long loveof Jane Austen and the world of Regency England.
author: Pamela Aidan
